findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: The contract allows minting of an unlimited number of tokens without any restrictions.

findings.title: Unprotected function calls
findings.description: The contracts IUniswapV2Router01 and others contain unprotected function calls which can lead to unauthorized access and manipulation of the contract state.

findings.title: Unsecured use of feeToSetter
findings.description: The feeToSetter function is used without proper security measures, potentially allowing unauthorized access to sensitive operations.

findings.title: Unsecured use of setFeeTo
findings.description: The function setFeeTo(address) is unsecured and can potentially lead to unauthorized fee settings.

findings.title: Unsecured use of createPair
findings.description: The createPair function is used without proper security measures, potentially leading to unauthorized creation of pairs.

findings.title: Unsecured use of transfer
findings.description: The _transfer function is used without proper security measures, potentially allowing unauthorized token transfers.

findings.title: Unsecured use of approve
findings.description: The 'approve' function is used without proper security measures.

findings.title: Unsecured use of transferFrom
findings.description: The contract uses an unsecured version of the transferFrom function, which can lead to unauthorized token transfers.

findings.title: Unsecured use of increaseAllowance
findings.description: The 'increaseAllowance' function is used without proper security measures, potentially leading to unauthorized access and manipulation of allowances.

findings.title: Unsecured use of decreaseAllowance
findings.description: The function does not properly check and decrease the allowance, which can lead to unauthorized token transfers.

findings.title: Unsecured use of excludeFromReward
findings.description: The excludeFromReward function is used without proper security measures.

findings.title: Unsecured use of setTaxFeePercent
findings.description: The function setTaxFeePercent allows an arbitrary user to set the tax fee percentage, which can lead to unauthorized changes to the contract's economy.

findings.title: Unsecured use of setLiquidityFeePercent
findings.description: The function setLiquidityFeePercent is unsecured and can be exploited to manipulate liquidity fee percentages.

findings.title: Unsecured use of setSwapAndLiquifyEnabled
findings.description: The function setSwapAndLiquifyEnabled is used without proper security measures.
